verses.name: Genesis 29:4
verses.text: And Jacob said unto them, My brethren, whence be ye? And they said, Of Haran are we.

verses.name: Genesis 29:5
verses.text: And he said unto them, Know ye Laban the son of Nahor? And they said, We know him.

verses.name: Genesis 29:6
verses.text: And he said unto them, Is he well? And they said, He is well: and, behold, Rachel his daughter cometh with the sheep.

verses.name: Genesis 29:7
verses.text: And he said, Lo, it is yet high day, neither is it time that the cattle should be gathered together: water ye the sheep, and go and feed them.
